data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh easterly airstream will affect the coast of southern China tomorrow. It will be humid in the morning and at night over the region. Under the influence of a trough of low pressure, there will be occasional showers and isolated thunderstorms over Guangdong towards the weekend to early next week. The northeast monsoon will bring a few rain patches to southern China midweek next week. Temperatures will fall slightly.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260226","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"East to southeast force 4, force 5 at first, occasionally force 6 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy with one or two rain patches.
